snippet: Morgan Stanley disclosed the timeline for some of its retirement awards to Paul J. Taubman, the senior deal maker who co-led its securities business.
abstract: Morgan Stanley disclosed the timeline for some of its retirement awards to Paul J. Taubman, the senior deal maker who co-led its securities business.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Discloses Payouts to Senior Deal Maker
